TopicTitle: Post your first screenshot in KSP Here

Articles.Content: If I had my actual first screenshot, I\'d post it.

These are my first 2 screenshots. I was a very happy boy... KSP finally opened and ran under Linux Just a small font issue I soon resolved. Had to take two to prove to my peers on another board KSP was ready for Linux. Many (like myself) refused to play if it meant running Windows.
